QuestData.Title: Commander Hobb
QuestData.Description: The Dragonmaw only dare attack us when our guard is down. They would face certain defeat if they were to attack us while we were prepared.$B$BI want you to let them come, $n.$B$B<Thelis nods.>$B$BYes... a trap. Take this flare that their overlord gave you and deliver it to Commander Hobb. He is standing guard right outside this building.
QuestData.LogDescription: Give the Dragonmaw Flare to Commander Hobb at the Sanctum of the Stars in Shadowmoon Valley.
